definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚1209也同样是一款耐用和可靠的好机型。

sentences.english: This best practice should still be followed.
sentences.chinese: 这个可靠实践方法仍然需要遵循。

sentences.english: An ergodic recursive Algorithm is suggested for the analyse of the reliability of distribution grid.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种分析配电网供电可靠性的遍历递归算法。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您确信个人网站的可靠性后才能利用它们。

sentences.english: New employees are undependable or do not perform to expectations.
sentences.chinese: 新来的员工不可靠，或表现的不如预期。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith, a very white man, but a very yellow one.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生是位忠实可靠的人，但他很胆怯。

sentences.english: Again, the availability of financing is the key.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，是否有可靠的融资也是关键。

sentences.english: Optical Localizer have the very high accuracy and reliability, but very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 光学立体定位仪精度高，可靠性强，但是价格昂贵。

sentences.english: But not all advertisements are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，并非所有的广告都真实可靠。

sentences.english: A secure, memorable password is easy for you to remember, and hard for others to guess.
sentences.chinese: 安全可靠又难以遗忘的密码应该是易记且难猜的。

sentences.english: The semi-Markov process theory can be used to analyze the reliability of the system on this condition.
sentences.chinese: 但可以利用半马尔可夫过程理论分析系统的可靠性。

sentences.english: Reliability issues aside, there’s a deeper principle at stake here.
sentences.chinese: 先不提可靠性的问题，这里面有一个更深层的原则。

sentences.english: I can vouch for the accuracy of my information.
sentences.chinese: 我敢打保票，我的消息很可靠。

sentences.english: Stand up straight, don't lean on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 站立要端正，不可靠墙而立。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a simple and reliable way for atrial septal puncture.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍一种简单可靠的房间隔穿刺术方法。

sentences.english: The valves can used for pipe nozzle and have reliable performance.
sentences.chinese: 阀门可用于管端作放空阀用，性能可靠。
